settings.title: Trade Power Tools for Herne Bay Professionals
settings.paragraph_1: Herne Bay's coastal regeneration and the steady flow of residential work along the CT6 corridor keeps local tradespeople busy year-round. Invicta Tools at our Canterbury branch is a straight 20-minute drive down the A291 — no motorway, no hassle. We're the nearest authorised Makita and DeWalt trade counter to Herne Bay, with stock levels that match what you'd expect from a city-centre supplier.
settings.paragraph_2: Coastal conditions in Herne Bay put extra demands on tools and fixings. Our team can recommend marine-grade fasteners, stainless fixings, and the right sealants for exposed seafront work. For the power tools themselves, Makita's brushless motors handle damp conditions better and last longer — we'll talk you through the options.
settings.paragraph_3: Many Herne Bay builders combine a materials run to Canterbury with a stop at our Wincheap trade counter. We're open from 7:30am and carry everything from SDS drills and circular saws down to diamond blades and Torx bits. Free delivery on orders over £30 to all CT6 postcodes.

settings.title: Need Tools in Herne Bay?
settings.subtitle: Call our Canterbury branch for expert advice, or shop online with free delivery over £30.
